code: import React from"react";import"./ProductCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function getPriceRange(price){if(price>200&&price<500){return"₹250 - ₹1000";}else if(price>250&&price<1000){return"₹500 - ₹1000";}else if(price>700&&price<2000){return"₹1000 - ₹2000";}else if(price>1500&&price<3000){return"₹2000 - ₹3000";}else if(price>=3000){const lower=Math.floor(price/1000)*1000;const upper=lower+1000;return"\u20B9".concat(lower," - \u20B9").concat(upper);}else{return"Below ₹200";}}const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product,category}=_ref;console.log('--product--',product);console.log('--category--',category);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.imageUrls['800x800'],alt:product.title,style:{height:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",style:{background:"linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), rgb(0 0 0 / 0%)), url(".concat(product.imageUrls['800x800'],")"),filter:'blur(36px)',backgroundSize:'1px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{fontWeight:400},children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"category",children:product.categoryPath.split('>')[product.categoryPath.split('>').length-1]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["\u20B9",product.flipkartSpecialPrice.amount]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content-desc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"category",children:product.categoryPath.split('>')[product.categoryPath.split('>').length-1]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"price-range",children:getPriceRange(product.flipkartSpecialPrice.amount)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cta-wishlist price-range",children:"+ wishlist"})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
